upcomingEvents.description: Bringing together young innovators, entrepreneurs, and tech leaders to explore the future of technology in cultural preservation.

upcomingEvents.title: International Sports Tournament
upcomingEvents.description: Multi-sport tournament featuring teams from across Africa and Europe, promoting unity through sports.

upcomingEvents.title: Digital Heritage Workshop
upcomingEvents.description: Hands-on workshop on digital preservation techniques for cultural heritage sites and artifacts.

upcomingEvents.title: European-African Art Exchange
upcomingEvents.description: Two-week art exchange featuring contemporary works from European and African artists.

upcomingEvents.title: Cultural Diplomacy Forum
upcomingEvents.description: High-level forum bringing together cultural diplomats, policymakers, and cultural leaders.

overview.heading: 1. Overview
overview.text: We respect your privacy and comply with GDPR and relevant European regulations.

personalData.heading: 2. Personal Data We Collect
personalData.voluntary: Voluntary submission: names, emails, organization data, event registration details.
personalData.automatic: Automatic collection: IP address, device/browser type, site navigation patterns (via minimal, privacy-friendly analytics).

useOfInformation.heading: 3. Use of Information
useOfInformation.text: Your data helps us manage registrations, send updates, administer events, and improve our services.

cookies.heading: 4. Cookies & Analytics
cookies.text: We use essential cookies for functionality and may deploy privacy-focused analytics to understand usage trends without compromising anonymity.

dataSharing.heading: 5. Data Sharing & Transfers
dataSharing.text: We do not sell your data. We may share it with service providers (hosting, analytics, communications), but only under GDPR-compliant agreements. Data doesn’t leave the EEA unless strictly necessary and legally permissible.

dataRetention.heading: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.text: We keep personal data only as long as needed—for legitimate purposes, legal obligations, or until withdrawal of consent. After that, data is securely deleted or anonymized.

gdprRights.heading: 7. Your Rights Under GDPR
rightsList: Erase your data ("right to be forgotten")
gdprRights.footer: Submit such requests via the website's contact mechanism.

security.heading: 8. Security Measures
security.text: We take reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your data—encryption, access controls, and regular reviews.

policyUpdates.heading: 9. Policy Updates
policyUpdates.text: We may update this policy. The latest version will always be available on the site, and significant changes may be communicated via email or site announcements.

contact.heading: 10. Contact
contact.text: For any privacy concerns or requests, reach out via our website’s contact form or the email provided on the site.

acceptance.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By accessing or using this website, you agree to abide by these Terms of Use in full. If you're not on board, stop here.

purpose.heading: 2. Purpose and Scope
purpose.text: This site is dedicated to showcasing Intercontinental Values, Cultural Exchange, Tourism, Sports, Knowledge Exchange, Creativity, Language Exchange, Climate Change, Humanitarian activities, Inclusion, Innovation and every topic displayed on our “AREAS OF WORK”—via exhibitions, events, publications, and dialogue. Use it respectfully.

conduct.heading: 3. User Conduct
conduct.text: You must not misuse the website—no illegal content, hacking, impersonation, or infringement on intellectual property or others’ privacy.

intellectualProperty.heading: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.text: All content on this site—text, images, videos, logos—is protected by copyright. You may not print or download for personal, nor commercial use. Any use requires explicit written consent.

registration.heading: 5. Registration and Forms
registration.text: If you register for events or mailing lists, you must provide accurate information. Submitting a form implies acceptance of these Terms and any ancillary terms communicated at submission.

disclaimers.heading: 6. Disclaimers & Modifications
disclaimers.text: Content may change from time to time. We strive for accuracy. Changes will be communicated via mail if you are our newsletter subscriber.

law.heading: 7. Governing Law
law.text: These Terms are governed by the relevant laws of the European Union.

amendments.heading: 8. Amendments
amendments.text: We may update these Terms at any time. Continued use after changes means you accept them.
